framework-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
framework-staging.post-deploy: npm i ; grunt compile --sites=repo-name --env staging ; pm2 restart 0 -- repo-name --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking repo-name and restarting app.'; git pull git@github.com:engagementgamelab/repo-name.git master;
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; npm i ; grunt compile --sites=repo-name --env staging ; pm2 restart 0 -- repo-name --env staging

framework-production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'
framework-production.post-deploy: npm install ; grunt compile --sites=repo-name --env production ; pm2 restart 0 -- repo-name --env production

production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking repo-name and restarting app.';
production.post-deploy: npm i ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; grunt compile --sites=repo-name --env production ; NODE_ENV=production pm2 restart server.js -- repo-name --env production
